attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned:

In the interests of good local government, accountability and democracy call for the same terms of office to be applied to local government officers as are applied to councillors.

Local government officers make many important decisions which affect the people of the borough but if the decision has an adverse effect on a large number of people they have no means of removing the officer.  As well as this, many of these local government officers don’t even live inside the borough which their decisions effect.   

We call upon the government to make them accountable to us by requiring them to stand for election every four years and to make them live inside the borough which their decision affect.
